changelog.title: Version 2.0.8
details: Fixed update system 404 download errors with multiple URL fallbacks
Enhanced payment gateway email/phone validation with international support
Added background image to all payment gateway checkout pages
Improved error message positioning and auto-hide functionality
Fixed payment link success page redirect and display
Enhanced update button states (Update vs Check Update)
Added device information to error pages for better debugging
Resolved Nginx server infinite loading issues
Improved form validation with real-time feedback
Enhanced user experience with smooth animations and better error handling
